Plot: Ceddie, Earl of Dorincourt's only grandson and heir lives in America with his mother. The Earl, getting old, asks them to come to England. Ceddie, now Lord Fauntleroy, is an adorable little...
Title: Little Lord Fauntleroy
Writer: Blanche Hanalis (screenplay), Frances Hodgson Burnett (based on the novel by)
Actors: Ricky Schroder, Alec Guinness, Eric Porter, Colin Blakely
